text: Nake Tera akĩoya mũriũ wake Aburamu, na Loti mũrũ wa mũrũwe Harani, na Sarai mũtumia wa mũriũ wake Aburamu; nao makiumagara hamwe moime bũrũri wa Uri-kwa-Akalidei mathiĩ Kaanani. No rĩrĩa maakinyire bũrũri wetagwo Harani,11:31 Harani rĩarĩ itũũra thĩinĩ wa bũrũri wa Mesopotamia, na andũ akuo nĩmahooyaga mweri o ta ũrĩa andũ a Uri meekaga. magĩtũũra kuo.
